General.Name: Integrated Electronic Systems Lab Co Ltd
General.Description: Integrated Electronic Systems Lab Co., Ltd. provides automation and information solutions in China. The company offers power information collection terminal products; distribution automation terminal products; distribution network equipment; relay protection and substation computer monitoring products; intelligent substation auxiliary systems; power supply products; smart water, gas, and thermal equipment; smart charging equipment for electric vehicles; multi-meter-in-one collection equipment; and additive manufacturing products and services. It also provides smart grid solutions; smart utility solutions; smart energy solutions; and information security, smart water conservancy, and GIS/GPS solutions. Integrated Electronic Systems Lab Co., Ltd. was founded in 1984 and is based in Jinan, China.
General.Address: No.188, East Section of Huayuan Road, Jinan, China, 250100
